### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a wooden chest (position (-16.5, -49.5))

### Iron plate factory at positions (40.0, -82.0), (45.0, -83.0), (42.0, -81.0), (45.0, -80.0), (40.0, -79.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0)) with a burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a wooden chest (position (43.5, -82.5))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0)) with a burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a wooden chest (position (43.5, -82.5))
- Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0))
- Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0))

### Copper cable factory
No information available

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using insert_item but having no items to insert
- Make sure to have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace or other entity.

### Errors when extracting items but the entity does not contain the item
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to extract from actually contains the item you are trying to extract.

### Errors when placing entities next to other entities
- Make sure to check if the position where you are trying to place an entity is already occupied by another entity.
- Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction when placing entities next to other entities.

### Errors when using extract_item but the entity does not exist
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to extract from actually exists and is in the correct position.

### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process.

### Errors when burner inserter is out of fuel
- Ensure that the burner inserter has enough fuel to operate before using it.

### Errors when boiler is out of fuel
- Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel to operate before using it.

### Errors when steam engine has no input liquid
- Ensure that the steam engine has a valid input liquid before using it.

### Errors when steam engine has no fluid present in connections
- Ensure that the steam engine has a valid fluid connection before using it.
